name: testmu-skills
description: Production-grade Agent Skills for Test Automation — 45 frameworks, 15+ languages, cloud and local execution

skills.name: appium-automation-skill
skills.description: Generates production-grade Appium mobile automation scripts for Android and iOS in Java, Python, or JavaScript. Supports real device and emulator testing locally and on TestMu AI cloud with 100+ real devices. Use when the user asks to automate mobile apps, test on Android/iOS, write Appium tests, or mentions "Appium", "mobile testing", "real device", "app automation". Triggers on: "Appium", "mobile test", "Android test", "iOS test", "real device", "app automation", "UiAutomator", "XCUITest driver", "TestMu", "LambdaTest".
